1.content: Let's begin by picking our kid. I'm going to list different ages/genders, and from there we can come up with different characters to play the role of the kid.
1.title: Introductions.

11.content:
Avery: 4 Years old, dirty blond, green eyes, obese
Avery's got a medical condition that causes him to gain weight very easily. Dad doesn't seem to mind...

JJ: 2 Years old, black, black hair, thin
JJ's never been one to eat much. His doctors have been giving his father flack about it for a while now, so Daddy's gonna change things up a bit!

Peter: Newborn, black hair, blue eyes, average
Peter's father is a scientist researching the effects of hyperobesity... he's currently researching how well a human fattens from birth.

Cecil: 1 Year Old, brown hair, brown eyes, chubby
Cecil's father is so proud of his little boy! So proud, in fact, that's pulling out all the stops for his son's first birthday party.
11.title: Male 0-4 Years

choices: Joe was intent on letting his son have as normal a life as he could as he grew.
Joe wanted to see his son get fatter and fatter!
Joe found himself lusting over his son more and more every day...
111.content:
"You're not going to go outside and play?" Joseph, or Joe for short, asked his son Avery one early summer day.

"Nope." Avery said, sitting on the floor, reclining against the couch. his hands resting on his rotund belly.

"Ok, I'll go fix you a snack." Joe smiled and went into the kitchen, his eyes lingering on his obese son. For you see, Avery had a medical condition which made him prone to weight gain. In fact, he had been steadily fattening up for two years now. Strangely enough, part of the condition was that no matter how fat Avery got, it had minimal effects on his health.

This was just fine by Joe. Joe already knew before Avery came into his life that he thought chubby kids were cute, although he had never thought about larger kids. So when Avery was chubby, he was cute. Then Avery was fat, and he was even cuter. Then Avery was obese, and he was adorable, and Joe was enamored with how adorable his son was. Because of this love...
111.title: Avery

1112.content:
Whatever Joe thinks about his 4 year old son, he can think Avery’s cute he is when he’s so obese by any means, which is one of the main reasons why he wanted to make his son much fatter than ever before. Although Avery is still this young to know about his father’s ambitious love, he would later grow up thinking he’s been this fat all of his life and loving it in some sense.

Of course Joe could imagine on what would his son be like he was the fattest person in the world. Wether it be a ten year old or adult, that’s something remain to be seen, and his mind would always caught him when thinking about it. But right now, Avery looks cute for an four year old, but obese which he clearly enjoys it so far and sits back to watch some TV for some comfort.

The youngster is surely hungry, and ha father would waste no time but to make some snacks, just to keep his son happy, as well as himself to see him binge so much junk food or more. It didn’t take long and Joe would bring it over and places it to his son by the couch with that smile to his face.

“Hey there you go, son! All of these are yours!” Joe says with a happily tone.

“Wow, thanks Daddy!” Avery replied with that cute giggle before he would look at the snacks on the plate when he’s about to eat dozens of ____________ for himself.
1112.title: Joe wanted to see his son get fatter and fatter!

1113.content:
Because of this love, Joe, was starting to sneak looks at his son. He began to stop buying the larger sizes that Avery would need in a few months and had began to let his son indulge even more than he was already. He had more of an incentive more than just his want to see fat kids, he now wanted to see this one get so fat he couldnt move and to 'Have Fun' with him. The thought of his son getting so much fatter and submitting to him made him horny and he bit his lip and controlled himself.

"Here you go." Joe said as he presented his son with a large bowl of crisps and a 2 litre bottle of coke. "Your pizzas are in the oven they'll be a few minutes."

"Thanks dad." Avery said as He began shovelling handfuls of crisps into his mouth only stopping to take a swig of coke every now and again.

Just as he was thinking about how big his son was going to be in a few years he felt a sharp pang of compassion. What if that wasnt what Avery wanted to be? He had alreaddy turned into an obese flabby toddler he probably would never be slim anyway on account of his condition but he could still have a life. He knelt down beside his boy.

"Son, do you like being fat?" He asked nervously.
1113.title: Joe found himself lusting over his son more and...

choices: Try and preform more risque activities
11131.content:
"Yeah, I suppose. I like the feeling of being all squishy and round" Avery answered, puzzled as to why his father would interrupt his snack with such an inane question. Joe, hearing this smiled both on the inside and the outside. He patted his son on the head and the boy resumed eating his 'snack'. That sealed his plans.

The next day avery woke up to a lack of clothes in his wardrobe and a pile of twinkies and cola beside his bed. Avery was hungry so he climbed out of his bed and waddled to the pile, wearing only his overly tight pjs, the shirt strained by his soft stomach, the bottoms nearly at bursting. Between them a sliver of belly hanging down beneath the shirt and over the bottoms. He dropped onto his soft arse with a rather loud thud. He grabbed at the unwrapped twinkies and started shovelling them into his mouth.

Joe watched from the cameras set up around the boys room. The boy stuffed his face for what seemed like hours until he finnally finished only 15 minutes after he started. the strained shirt burst as he let out a large sigh. The buttons came away from their fastnings and flung across the room as the boys large belly flopped out into his lap and stuck out an inch further than last night. Avery poked at his growing belly and played his pudgey fingers across his belly.
11131.title: I like it

113.content:
Peter's birth was a secret to the world. When his mother became pregnant and didn't have means to take care of the child, she was approached by his father, Dr. Henry Klein, a distant relative. He took her in and kept her away from the rest of the world for nine months, all the while he took care of her every need. Nine months passed, and the woman who had seemingly dropped off the face of the planted birthed a baby boy nobody but the two of them knew she was pregnant with. Peter's birth was not on any record. Dr. Klein had delivered the child on his own.

All this meant that Peter and his adoptive father were safe from the eyes of the public, which would be necessary for Dr. Klein's plans. Dr. Klein is known for his research in human health, specifically the metabolism and how the body stores fat. Many of his theories involved experimenting with the concept of hyperobesity, the idea of a human freakishly obese beyond the point of immobility, a concept that seemed impossible. Dr. Klein speculated it could be, and he felt it was his duty to prove it. He knew there were those out in the world who, if they were able, would trade their lives away to experience immobility, and many who would desire to be obese were it not for adverse health consequences. He himself once had a lover who was enamored with gaining weight, but when his lover was diagnosed with diabetes, they stopped gaining, lost much of their weight, cut off ties with Dr. Klein and apparently fell into depression years later.

Peter represented Henry Klein's hope for the world. He had the potential to be fattened from birth onward, and with Dr. Klein's resources the two of them could bring Peter a level of obesity nobody had ever experienced, and hopefully they would do so with no adverse health consequences.

Dr. Klein cradled Peter in his arms as the baby wailed. He brought to the baby's lips a bottle of baby formula. Special formula that would slow the metabolism and provide plenty of calories, all while strengthening hearth health, bone health and blood flow. Peter was an average baby, but that wouldn't be for long...
113.title: Peter

115.content:
James: 3 Years old, blonde, blue eyes, chunky
James is the son of a pedophile named Chris and a girl he kidnapped and kept in his basement, all Chris knows is the plush room built for him in the basement. His first memories are that of his father playing with him in ways he shouldn't, his mum still occasionally feeds him from her extremely chunky boobs. She was 11 when she was kidnapped and she has since pentupled in weight and had two other children she now believes implicitly that it is her life's devotion to pump out kids for Chris. Lucky for her Chris is a doctor as well as a pedophile
115.title: More Boys

12.content:
Timmy: 7 Years Old, Caucasian, blonde, blue eyes, slim
Timmy's father is a big man, and Timmy wants to be just like his dad! How will Daddy respond?

Jake: 6 Years Old, Caucasian, dirty blond hair, hazel eyes, slim
Jake's father has always desired to fatten up a young boy, but has held himself back for the sake of his son. But Jake's been eating a lot lately...

Charlie: 5 Years Old, black, black hair, brown eyes, chubby
Charlie likes to sit in front of the TV and munch on snacks all day, and his Dad loves him too much to make him do otherwise. Charlie's favorite cartoon episodes are the ones where the characters get really fat, because then they have a belly like him!

Yuuto: 8 Years Old, Japanese, brown eyes, fat
Yuuto's on his way to being a champion sumo wrestler, and with the help from his father, a famous champion sumo wrestler, he's got a BIG future ahead of him!
12.title: Male 5-8 Years

choices: Timmy pushes himself to eat as much as possible!
Greg challenges Timmy to an eating contest.
Timmy keeps talking about being like his dad.
121.content:
Timmy stood undressed save for his undies in front of his bedroom mirror. He struck several silly poses to his reflection, giggling. Then he took a deep breath and stuck out his belly as much as he could and have it a big pat. Timmy grinned to himself. "Just like Dad!" He thought!

Timmy loves his Dad, Greg, very much. Greg does a great job balancing work and caring for Timmy. He's been able to work from home for the last several years, so he's always able to watch Timmy, and vice versa. Timmy has been able to witness how, for as long as he can remember, his father has been steadily climbing in weight. Four years ago, Greg weighed 180lbs at 5'11". Now he is 280lbs. Much of his weight has gone into his round ball belly. Timmy remembers being able to sit in his Dad's lap, but as he and his father both grew in different ways, he was slowly pushed off the lap by a ball of fat.

Timmy loves his Dad's belly. He loves the way he pats it after a full meal, he loves the way it sits on his waist, and he loves the way it makes his dad look big and manly! As Timmy patted his own flat stomach, he realized that his attempt at sticking him middle out was in no way close to his Dad's. He looked around and got an idea.

Timmy dug through his drawers and got out his biggest t-shit. He threw it on, as well as some jeans, and stuffed his pillow under his shirt. The young boy returned to the mirror and stuck out his "belly" again, giving it a rub and squeezing it. "Now I look like Dad!" He thought, grinning. Timmy admired his fake fat in the mirror. He imagined having a real belly like that, standing next to his dad, rubbing bellies together, belly bumping, pigging out, and all the other cool things you do with a belly. Timmy sighed gently. "Wouldn't that be cool?" He though.

Just then, his dad opened the door. "Timmy, it's time for dinner," he said. He then noticed Timmy's "belly". "What're you doing there, kiddo?" He chuckled.

"I'm being you!" Timmy said proudly.

Greg laughed heartily. "Haha, so you are! But I think I've still got you beat!" He gave his own belly a slap. "Now come on, it's pasta night!"

"Sure thing Dad! But I'm gonna beat YOU some day!" Timmy said, tossing his pillow back onto the bed, before heading to the table.
121.title: Timmy

1211.content:
Normally dinner between Timmy and Greg is a social event. The two talk about their days, specifically Timmy's time at school and if Greg had any interesting moments while Timmy was there. This time however, there wasn't much talk, mostly because whenever Greg would ask Timmy a question he would respond with a very short, three word answer. Timmy was too busy stuffing his face!

"Wow, you didn't tell me you were this hungry!" Greg said after Timmy slurped down the last spaghetti on his plate.

"Yep, I'm super hungry!" Timmy grinned. He wasn't ACTUALLY hungry, in fact he was quite full. He just wanted to make a glutton out of himself.

"Well then I'll get us both some more, ok?" Greg got up to refill their plates. Greg always got seconds for dinner, so Timmy was happy he could match his dad.

"Thanks, Dad!" Timmy said as he rubbed his stuffed stomach to prepare for the next round. However, when his dad returned with plates, his portion of pasta had doubled!

"I figured if you're extra hungry you can finish this!" Greg said, smiling. It wasn't a challenge, but Greg sometimes forgets that not every shares his appetite.

"Of course! I'm gonna eat it all!" Timmy said, staring at the mountain of carbs on his plate. He picked up his fork and twisted up some spaghetti, but when he brought it to his mouth he felt his urge to stuff dwindle. He downed it in a few chews and gulps and he felt the pasta his his gut like a rock, he was so full. 20 minutes of fighting to eat passed and Timmy had, impressively, finished most of the pasta on the table.

"Huh, I thought you were hungry." Greg said, eyeing his son clutch his belly and moan softly. "You ok there? What ever happened to beating me?" He teased, folding his arms across his gut.

"Nooo, I can do it..." Timmy groaned. He picked his fork up weakly and stabbed at his plate, missing the pasta entirely. Greg heaved himself up from his chair with a grunt and reached over with his own fork, scooping up a forkful of his son's dinner.

"Guess I'll just finish it then..." He said, bring the forkful to his own mouth, but Timmy protested.

"Nooooooo, I can do it! I can do it..." Timmy whined, reaching at him.

Greg sighed and shook his head, smirking. "Fine, open up." He lowered the forkful into Timmy's open maw and the boy chewed for half a minute before swallowing. He then opened his mouth again, expectantly. Greg raised an eyebrow but went along with his son's game. He picked up the plate and scraped the last chunk of pasta into Timmy's mouth, letting his son chew it and swallow.

"I... win..." Timmy sighed, panting. "So... dessert...?"

Greg laughed. "No, I think you've had enough, little pig. Let's get you to bed, you look exhausted." Greg scooped Timmy up in his beefy arms and carried him into his room, laying him on his bed. "Night, little pig." He said as he closed the door.

"Night, big pig!" Timmy called back at him as the door closed. He waited a moment afterwards before getting up out of his bed and waddling over to his mirror. Timmy lifted up his shirt and stuck out his belly. It looked rounder, being stuffed to it's limit. It pressed against the waist of his jeans and made him look pregnant. "That's more like Dad..." he said to himself, patting it lightly. "Big pig..."
1211.title: Timmy pushes himself to eat as much as possible!

choices: "But I can't let you get FAT, that would be irresponsible!"
"If you want to get fat, well then I can really teach you how, little pig!"
"But I want to be the big pig!"
12113.content:
After that evening's stuffing, Timmy realized how much he enjoyed having a full, round belly! He realized that if he ate enough, he could have a round stomach just like his dad, and the thought of this excited him. So for the next week, Timmy went out of his way to binge for every meal! It was difficult at first, but as Timmy's stomach adjusted to being full all the time his appetite grew. Late at night he would sneak out of his room and bloat himself with as much water as possible, and then go admire his sloshing stomach in the mirror, rubbing it and giving his reflection a belly bump.

Timmy hadn't gained any weight, or at least no more than a pound of fat, and this disappointed him, but he could tell that he was eating more than ever. Greg noticed this too, as the two were digging into yet another weekly pasta night. Both plates were piled high with cheesy, buttery ravioli. Timmy had been able to clear both his first plate and second with no problem, and it looked like he might be ready for dessert!

"You've been eating a lot lately, kiddo. You having a growth spurt?" Greg said, trying not to directly accuse his son of anything.

"Yeah, I'm growing alright!" Timmy said, smiling and rubbing his belly. "I've been working really hard, and now I can eat tons!"

Greg gave Timmy a curious look. "What's this all about, Timmy?"

"Don't you remember? I told you I'm gonna beat you! Last week you called me 'little pig', well I'm gonna be 'big pig'!" Timmy pounded his fists on the table, giggling. "Let's have dessert!"

"Now hold on." Greg paused for a moment. "Are you serious about this? Do you really want to end up fat like me?"

Timmy paused for a moment to think about how to articulate his feelings. "Well, I want to be like you, Dad! And I love your belly. It's really cool, and I want a big belly too! I don't know if I want to have boy breasts or a really fat butt, but it would be so fun to have a huge belly!" Timmy threw up his shirt and stuck out his already stuffed stomach and made a gesture as if it were expanding. "I wanna be the big pig, and eat everything and be HUGE!" Timmy grinned

"Well, Tim, I'm flattered..." Greg chuckled...
12113.title: A week later...

choices: At The All You Can Eat Resturant
121132.content:
"Well, Tim, I'm flattered..." Greg chuckled. "If you want to get fat, well then I can really teach you how, little pig!"

"Really?" Timmy was astonished to hear before asking his Dad again. "Do you really mean it, Dad?"

"Sure I do, Tim! I'm sure gonna teach you to be like me, but it'll take some time to get you gained in the meanwhile, so whatever you do, keep eating while you can, son!" Greg replied and give his son an advice to continue eating, just like Timmy did some a week prior.

"This is gonna be awesome! Thanks Dad, you're the best!" With that, Timmy was in a happy mood, he starts to embrace with his father which he could feel the warmth of the weight as cuddling as Timmy feels comfortable in all.

It may be the risk to make, but Greg wanted to insure that his son would be like him. Although unknowing what the process of that gain, weather it could be Timmy's belly, butt or boy breasts, depends on how his body would take him, Greg wanted to make sure that Timmy would be just like him, and it would be a while yet.

The next day, Timmy was already awakened and was ready to head off with his Dad, knowing that they're heading to get something to eat, and the start of helping Timmy getting fatter in the process. Greg had many ways to gain weight in his prime, so it was an opportunity when he takes his son to where?
121132.title: Timmy's Desires Accepted

choices: At the buffet, Timmy surprises Greg...
At the buffet, Timmy sees another gluttonous boy...
1211323.content:
"Rise and shine, little pig!" Greg said, gently rustling his son awake.

"Huh...?" Timmy's eyes pried open. "Huh?!? Did I fall asleep? Is it tomorrow and I missed it?" The young boy asked frantically, his eyes, darting around for a clock or the time of day.

"No, you just fell asleep after lunch, silly." Greg rustled his son's hair. True enough, Timmy was sprawled across the living room couch for about an hour after a massive lunch, courtesy of his father. Since agreeing to help fatten Timmy up, Greg had been pulling out all the stops and often that left Timmy dazed with an achingly full stomach. But whenever Timmy would groan or complain, Greg would remind his son that "If you keep stretching your stomach now, some day you'll be able to eat an entire kitchen in one meal!" The cartoonish thought of such immense gluttony inspired Timmy and spurred him on.

It had only been a week, but there had been some results. Timmy's stomach had grown a touch softer, barely enough for the boy to tell. Greg wouldn't let Timmy step on a scale though, because apparently it would discourage him and seeing the number on the scale go up should be a reward, like third dessert. This metaphor was somewhat lost on Timmy, who had begun to see third dessert as an integral part of any good evening meal.

Of course, this is because Timmy's appetite had also expanded over the past week, or at least his tolerance to the feeling of fullness. Thus, although it had only been an hour since their last meal, Timmy hefted himself up off the couch and grinned at his father, saying "So is it time? Can we go to the buffet?"

Greg nodded like a wise master. "It's time." He then broke into a grin, leaned down and tickled his son's belly. "Ready to show off how big you are, little pig?"

"Yeah! I'm the biggest little pig!" Timmy puffed out his stomach and slapped it comically.

"Yes you are..." Greg chuckled as he turned to get the keys.
1211323.title: At The All You Can Eat Resturant

12113231.content:
A car journey later, and both a father and son arrived at the buffet and was brought to the table to have a seat. This is the place both usually go, particularly it was Greg’s favourite hang out from work, and be would always takes Timmy for a treat and have anything they want. Now it seems to be a challenge as far as Timmy’s case is concerned. If he really wants to be as fat as Dad, he may need to feed more food than just one plate.

“Are you ready to get what you wanting?” Greg asked his son.

“Yeah, I can’t wait to get dozens of food to my mouth, and be like you.” That was Timmy’s statement when he made his response.

Greg chuckled and so both headed to the counter, where they can pick up any amount of food they would satisfy their tastes.

For Greg, he would take his usual portion and has a large plate to fill it up, whilst he was also smiling down to Timmy and getting his too. Once he fill it up, Greg comes over to the table and sat himself down to have his meal. But not before he would receive a surprise when he see’s his seven year old son grabbing not one, but four large plates of food and brought over to the table.

He knew Timmy was gonna be as fat as himself, but never he had thought the youngster could get loads of food to stuff himself in. He was a little concerned as such and asks Timmy with a confused look, but wanted to try and put that smile, as if he wants to make his son happy.

“Wow, that’s a lotta food you’ve got! Are you are you’re gonna eat the whole lot yourself?” Grey wondered!”

“Don’t worry Dad! I can eat this thing no problem!” Timmy seems to be confident when he nodded.

“Alright then, just be careful and take your time, okay?” Grey chuckled a bit and gives his son a advice before both began stuffing their food in.

Timmy knew it was gonna be challenging from his point of view, but he is so eager to try and fill it up. Starting with the first plate, which consists of different flavours of pizzas that looks so good on paper. He lifts up the first batch and stuffs himself in, and makes a satisfaction sound, making his father chuckled whilst eating his own.

It would take a couple of moments later, when had finished his large plate and lays back to let out a belch in satisfaction. Meanwhile, he looks to see his son was finishing off the first plate and also let out a loud belch, but he wasn’t done judging by the plates the youngster has got left. One down, and two to go to be exact!

Timmy doesn’t seem to be slowing down quite yet, but Greg was a little bit skeptical about this, and wondered whether Timmy needs help or not?

“Timmy, do you want Daddy to feed you?” Greg asked in a curious tone, but what was Timmy’s response?
12113231.title: Timmy Takes Extras!

choices: Yes, Timmy beat finished the pastas first before his Dad.
No, His Dad had finished the pastas first before Timmy.
1212.content:
Timmy was so excited in many ways, not only he was going to be like his father in weight, but pasta was one of his favorite meals, which normally he'll finish it off no problem. So there was no surprise to see that he was greeted by two very large plates, with full of pastas, looking as if each weigh 50lbs. The youngster was astonished to see this, since he never felt he could try and eat the past that this rate

"Whoa, that's a lot of pasta I could eat." Timmy was amazed and soon sat down on the table before Greg, his Dad joins him before he tales him something with a smile to his face.

"I know, and that's why I'm challenging you to an eating contest, maybe hopefully, you could beat me, it you're up for it?" Greg had made a big deal for his son to make.

That shocked a seven year old kid, which in some ways, he has two things it now brought to his mind. First, this could be the sigh he could develop his weight gain which would be the start of things, and second, he wants to beat his Dad on anything. He may had tried and even came this close, but being full wasn't enough to put that down, and so it was a huge opportunity for Timmy to archive his goal.

"Alright then, Deal!" Timmy nodded with that confident smile, and soon both are in their starting marks, and then once it ticks at twelve on the clock, both of them have began eating their pasta in full desires.

Greg had started strong to which he had done challenges to his name, so it was up to Timmy to think of a ways to race and playing catch up to his father. of course being a kid, he was in a rush, desperately eating so many pasta in one go, even his Dad would notice, but knew that could slow things down if he isn't careful.

The only thing Timmy was thinking is first being like his Dad, and overcome a contest, which with pasta covered his mouth all over, he was trying his best to archive this feast, and it took more than 20 minutes to finish things off. But the question is, did he beat his Dad at last?
1212.title: Looking for some challenge

choices: Paul tries to get Jake to cut back.
A week later, Jake's binging starts to show...
122.content:
Jake's father, Paul, had a dirty secret. Paul was bisexual. This was not his secret. Paul liked bigger boys. Not just bigger... fatter. Paul liked the idea of a guy gorging himself to the point of obesity and loving it. This, while being something he did not openly admit to, was not Paul's specific secret. Paul like younger guys. MUCH younger. Paul liked the idea of fattening up young boys, feeding them and squeezing their soft, growing bellies... and it disgusted him. Paul liked fat little boys, but hated himself for it.

Paul himself was a well built 5'10". He frequently went to the gym and ate healthily, partly in rebellion against his shameful desires. He cared for his son Jake with all his heart. He had to put in the extra effort, since his mother passed away in labor. Jake was an average 6 year old boy, goofy and into trucks and dinosaurs and the color red. Ever since Jake was born Paul promised he would never, EVER place his desires on his son, and he had stayed true to his word. Jake was slim, and he always ate average amounts. He never snacked. He played outside a lot. Paul was confident that his most shameful secrets would never have to haunt him in the real world.

This thought of course, was shaken as Paul sat across from Jake at the dinner table. Jake was ravenously tearing through his third plate of steak and potatoes. His flat stomach had bulged out from the stuffing, causing his shirt to ride up. Paul's legs quivered in his seat as Jake tore into the thick meat joyously. After finishing that third plate, Jake leaned back patted his stomach and sighed. "Great dinner, Dad! What's for dessert?"

The past two weeks, Jake had been acting strange. His appetite had gone through the roof! Suddenly he was snacking all day. When Jake insisted he go shopping with Paul, it seemed sweet at first, but Jake coerced Paul into buying twice the weekly budget and all in soft drinks, chips and other things he otherwise wouldn't buy. Paul felt weak for giving in, and looking across at his gluttonous son he hated how he felt about all of this.

"H-haven't you had enough? You aren't full?" Paul said, his voice slightly wavering.

"Of course I'm full, I just ate like three steaks! But they were sooooo gooooood, and so is dessert!" Jake grinned! He hopped up out of his seat like his binge was nothing and opened the fridge, pulling out a tub of ice cream. He popped it open and grabbed a spoon as Paul watched, wide eyed.

"Jake, you can't just..." He started, but his son cut him off.

"Oh crud! I already ate like half of it earlier..." He said to himself. "Oh well," and he started to dig in.

Paul gulped. His hand unconsciously slid down his own inner thigh, but once he realized where it was going he jerked it up, banging it it against the table. "Oh, shhhhhhhhoot..." He caught himself from cussing. Jake hadn't noticed, he was scraping the bottom of the ice cream tub.

"Wow, that was good! I'm so stuffed, Dad!" Jake leaned back and rubbed his swollen gut.

"Uh huh..." Paul's cheeks reddened. "W-we've got to get you to bed. No more food tonight." He slid out of his own chair and grabbed Jake's shoulder, leading him to bed. "Night Jake... Love you." Paul said through the door. He then slid down against the wall and groaned into his hands. What on Earth was happening?
122.title: Jake

choices: Paul comes home with the pizzas
Jake's behavior escalates beyond just binging...
1222.content:
A week had gone by and Jake's nonstop feasting had continued. Paul was bewildered as to how his supposedly normal son became such a ravaging glutton! He was equally bewildered at how helpless he was to stop his own son. Every time Paul tried to take some chips away from Jake or convince him they didn't need to stop for another round of McDonalds, he would pull something that would make Paul's insides turn to slush. Whether it be moan about how hungry he is, or clutch at his tummy and say he needs to be fed, it was like Jake knew how to get into his mind and exploit Paul's suppressed perversion. Strangely enough, when Paul asked about Jake's behavior at school, the teacher told him that everything was normal. Even his appetite was completely average when he was at lunch...

Three weeks in total had gone by of Jake's new appetite, and Paul's worst fear was starting to come into realization. Jake came out of his room before school, shirtless. "Dad, my pants feel really tight, it hurts..." Jake's stomach had grown soft with a layer of fat. The button of his pants was cutting into his tummy, giving him a muffin top. All along Jake's torso, his ribs were no longer visible, and his chest had grown just the slightest bit poofy. Paul's eyes wandered up and down his son's plumped up form. He had definitely gained somewhere between 10-12 pounds.

"No, no that's impossible..." Paul thought to himself. "Do you have any jeans that fit better?" Paul asked out loud, fearing to get up from where he was sitting with his morning coffee.

1532.content:
James MacInnes loved his daughter more than anything else.

She was the light of his world, the rock he hung onto in the swirling sea of his life. Everything he did he did for her; every hour spent at his job, every dollar spent at every store, all of it was to make Kristin happy. He would walk through hell and back to make her life better. When she smiled, there was no happier man in all the world. When she frowned, it was all he could do not to beat whatever saddening thing their was into submission.

And, to his great dismay, Kristin seemed to frown far more than she smiled.

Once upon a time, James had been a soldier, a proud Sergeant Major in the National Guard. He had a lovely wife, Emma, a beautiful four-year-old daughter, Kristin, and a happy life. For six blissful years, all seemed to be wonderful.

Then, war came to the world once more. Both Republics of the Congo, Democratic and not, went to war to try to conquer the other; this soon blossomed into an Africa-wide war. Ancient resentments came to the surface, and the larger powers, sensing an opportunity, dove in to re-carve the continent in their favor. The United States, wishing to secure its place, deployed troops everywhere they could; James' unit, bolstered with exuberant young officers and good, hardy enlisted, was deployed to the Gambia, a tiny country suffering badly under repeated attacks from Senegal- a country which surrounded the other on all sides but the sea.

Sergeant Major MacInnes saw many horrors there- horrors of combat, of supreme anger, of savage butchery. Lieutenant after lieutenant above him fell to haphazard gunfire; private after private under his command succumbed to malaria, to land mines, to vicious animals, to enemy machetes. He was only there for a year, but each day felt to him like a century. When he finally made it out, he was an entirely different man.

And, when he arrived home to his house, expecting a warm welcome from his wife and daughter, he found only a note stating in no uncertain terms that Emma had run off with a stockbroker and left Kristin in the care of her grandparents, "to be left till called for."

That had been six years ago. For those six years, James had devoted himself entirely to making Kristin happy. Whatever made her smile, even a little, he acquired in abundance. Whatever made her happy would be hers.

Unfortunately, now that very thing that made her happy seemed to be making her sad once more.

_____________________________________

"Daddy! I'm home!"

Barely had the door slammed behind her before James was up and out of his seat, heading for the door with a broad smile on his face. "Kristin, it's good to see you! How was your day?"

"Oh...it was fine..."

James was not about to be fooled by that. "Darling, you can always tell me what's going on. You know that, right?"

Kristin sighed, then drew in a deep, shuddering breath. "Oh Daddy...they made fun of me again!"

James frowned with grave concern and kneeled before her. "Come here, dear. Tell me all about it."

Kristin burst into tears and ran for her father's arms, knocking the wind out of him with a startled whoof. "I-In the locker room hic...before g-gym class...J-Jenny Woolesly made the other girls c-count the rolls on my wheeze m-my back..."

"Sh-sh, darling, it's gonna be okay. Daddy's here now, I won't let them hurt you anymore..." he whispered, rocking his beloved daughter into a sense of security. Over the years, James had fallen rather deeply into denial; therefore, he was firmly convinced that 324 pounds was a perfectly reasonable weight for a 10-year old girl. Furthermore, he had also managed to convince himself that more food was most definitely the way to go to make her even healthier. Hopefully even happier too.

But, in a dark corner of his mind, a small kernel of doubt, something that had never been there before, sprang into existence. Maybe she is a bit overweight?

James put the thought out of his head. Kristin would have to need a snack after her long day.

"Hey honey," James said softly in his daughter's ear, "why don't you get comfy on the couch, put the TV on, I'll get you a nice snack, and you can relax. How's that sound?"
Kristin sniffled and whimpered, her chubby cheek squished against her dad's shoulder. "Mm..." she mumbled, which James knew was how she said "Yes" when she was upset.
"Alright, c'mon then," he cooed, and slowly stood up. His tubby girl wiped her eyes and sniffled again.

"C-can I have some of the leftover cake...?" She muttered, "A-and a burger...?"

"Of course you can dear," he smiled and stroked his daughter's hair, "you can have whatever you like."

Kristin nodded a little, and slowly turned around to waddle to the living room. James turned to the kitchen and started getting a snack together for his girl.

The kitchen was packed with everything a 10 year old girl would like - at least, a 10 year old girl like Kristin. Pizza, burgers and fries were loaded into the freezer, cakes and sugary treats in the fridge, and chocolate bars and bags of chips in the pantry. Everything she wanted, she got.
It'd be a good few hours till dinner, and Kristin wasn't exactly known for spoiling her appetite with sweets, so James got to work.

After about ten minutes, James was carrying a tray into the living room. A cheeseburger, some fries, a few slices of gooey chocolate fudge cake, a large-size chocolate bar and a bottle of chocolate milk covered it. Kristin's face already lit up when she looked up at her dad from the cartoons on TV.

"Here you are hon," he smiled and set the tray next to his 'little' girl on the couch.
"Thanks daddy," she muttered, already starting to calm down, and started eating up her hearty snack.

"Just shout if you need anything," James smiled and went back to the kitchen.

“I wonder what's for breakfast?” Rachael said to herself, before entering the kitchen to find her father happily cooking pancakes and stacking them on a tall tower.

“Pancakes?! My favourite!” She beamed, almost jumping with joy. “And they look so good Daddy, but…” Rachael suddenly remembered something very crucial at that moment. “I thought Daddy couldn’t cook…?”

James laughed at that statement and replied, “Well I thought so too, but for some reason, everything makes perfect sense now, I don’t know to describe it sweetheart.”

Rachael suddenly remembered what she did last night and giggled with delight from realisation, “I think my wish came true.” She whispered to herself softly.

UUUUUUUUURRRRRRPPPPP!!!

info.brief_description: A single father and his kid have a growing relationship...
info.description:
A single father lives alone with his son/daughter (you choose), and through various events, one or both of them ends up packing on the pounds...

RULES:

-This is a weight gain themed story. Keep all plotlines relevant to that.

-Keep the writing well done. Good grammar please. I'm not demanding minimum chapter lengths, since there can be great short chapters, but no chapters like "he ate lots and got fatter and was fat and he said give me food and he ate and got fatter." Everyone loves details. Run-on sentences are gross. I'm probably not going to remove any chapters, but if the quality of writing is consistently in the way of the creative flow, I may remove a chapter. I won't do this without sending a message to the author explaining why this had to be done, and you're still free to add another chapter, just so long as it fits what the story needs.

-If you want to introduce other kinks/fetishes, feel free but PLEASE make sure to leave room for a plotline to go in multiple ways. "New Choice" is always a great option to leave. For example, if you want to, say, have a plotline with scat, DO NOT make both options for a chapter imply scat. Chapters that do this count as ones that inhibit the creative flow, and if we see a lot of these I may have to remove one or two.

-Sex is allowed. Gay sex is allowed. Sexual relations between the kid and father are allowed. Go crazy

-There's no weight limit, but keep the gaining realistic. Don't say anyone gained 2 pounds from a cookie. Try to rely on good old fashion food to fatten up our characters.

-Let loose, loosen your belt and have fun!
